title: Wall Street's #MeToo Setback
description:
The revelations exposed during the #MeToo era have been felt across the country. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's Katia Porzecanski, who reports that despite the movement's progress, a setback is taking place on Wall Street that's seeing women isolated by their male counterparts.
FOLLOW UP
 Katia's latest report: Wall Street Rule for the #MeToo Era: Avoid Women at All Cost
You can follow Katia at: @KatiaPorzo 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
